Package net.proteusframework.users.authentication

User authentication API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LoginAsDecisionProvider
    Interface for classes that implement application logic regarding who can login as who.
    LoginHistoryItemPopulator
    Optionally provided by applications that have the ability to populate additional data to new PrincipalLoginHistoryItems that are not available in the base API.
    PasswordRuleChecker
    Validate the rules for a password.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllowAnythingPasswordRuleChecker
    Rule check that allows anything.
    AutoLoginWithNoCredentialsFilter
    Automatically login.
    AutoRememberMeAuthenticationTrustResolver
    Implementation of AuthenticationTrustResolver which works with acegi-util implementation of RememberMeServices for cookie-based (anonymous) authentication.
    CaptchaService
    Singleton for the CAPTCHA service.
    ClearSessionAndRedirectFilter
    Clears any existing HTTP session and redirects to a specified URL.
    CredentialPolicyPasswordRuleChecker
    Password rule checker that uses CredentialPolicy.
    LengthPasswordRuleChecker
    A default password rule checker that just checks the password length.
    LoginAsPrincipalWrapper
    A PrincipalWrapper that is used when a user authenticates as another user.
    LoginHistoryListener
    Records login history for login events.
    PasswordRuleCheckerFactory
    Gets the configured or default PasswordRuleChecker implementation.
    PrincipalWrapper
    A wrapper for Principal that is completely safe from hibernate session sharing and thread safey issues.
    ProteusConcurrentSessionControllerImpl
    Control users concurrent session access based on Role.getMaxConcurrentLogins()
    ProteusRememberMeProcessingFilter
    Customized version of the normal remember-me processing filter which will apply token authentication even if a principal is authenticated, provided that the authenticated principal's security level is weak enough.
    ProteusWebAuthenticationDetails
    ProteusWebAuthenticationDetails with extra properties.
    RecordAccessFilter
    Records access to the PrincipalWrapper for tracking logout times.
    SessionEndRecordingListener
    Listens for sessions closing and records the access count and last access time in the PrincipalLoginHistoryItem
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CaptchaService.CaptchaType
    The type of captcha.

Package net.proteusframework.users.authentication Description

User authentication API.
